revised_title: Mutual Potential Energy of a Plane Network of Doublets
tldr: This article calculates the mutual potential energy of a plane network of doublets, specifically electric or magnetic doublets in a plane with their axes perpendicular to the plane. The author considers two special cases of molecular packing: a simple square network and an equi-triangular network. The results show that the mutual potential energy differs by only about 2% between the two cases, allowing for a fairly accurate estimate of the energy for various modes of molecular packing.
